question_en: Which famous kingdoms were a part of the Marwar region in the past?

question_en: Who was the first ruler of Rajasthan?
explanation_en: Rasht Rai was the first ruler of Rajasthan.

question_en: Which city is known as the Pink City of Rajasthan?
explanation_en: Amber is known as the Pink City of Rajasthan due to its pink coloured forts.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous Rana ruled during the Mughal period?
explanation_en: Rana Lal Singh was a famous Rana who ruled Rajasthan during the Mughal era.
